title: You Don’t Hate Them Enough
author: VD
content_html:
Both my parents and my husbands parents are making us do early Christmases between their Mexico trips. This is my sons 1st Christmas. #boomers

No, this isn’t from Reddit. It’s definitely real. I wish I could say it’s unbelievable.

DISCUSS ON SG
